statements: SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_1 = TRUE
SELECT last_name, first_name, email FROM customers_preferences ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_2 = TRUE AND preference_3 = FALSE
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%'
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers_preferences WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_1 = TRUE ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, email FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_2 = TRUE AND preference_3 = FALSE;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers_preferences WHERE email LIKE '%gmail.com%' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, preference_1, preference_2, preference_3 FROM customers_preferences WHERE preference_1 = FALSE AND last_name like 'S%';
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = true;
SELECT customer_id, email, preference_2 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = false;
SELECT * FROM email_content WHERE sent_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT recipient_id, subject, body FROM email_content ORDER BY sent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_preferences WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT name, email FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = TRUE
SELECT * FROM email_content WHERE subject LIKE '%Promotion%'
SELECT customer_id, preference_1 FROM customer_preferences WHERE preference_1 = FALSE AND preference_2 = TRUE
SELECT recipient_id, subject, sent_date FROM email_content ORDER BY sent_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM preferences ORDER BY preference_name DESC;
SELECT content_id, email_subject, email_body FROM email_content WHERE customer_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM customers ORDER BY first_name ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 3;

SELECT preferences.preference_name, preferences.preference_value, customers.first_name, customers.last_name FROM preferences JOIN customers ON preferences.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE preferences.preference_name = 'newsletter';

SELECT email_content.email_subject, email_content.email_body, customers.first_name, customers.last_name FROM email_content JOIN customers ON email_content.customer_id = customers.customer_id WHERE email_content.customer_id = 2;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM customers WHERE first_name LIKE 'J%' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT template_name, subject_line FROM email_templates WHERE template_id = 2;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email_address, sent_date FROM customers JOIN campaign_recipients ON customers.customer_id = campaign_recipients.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, email_address FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%'
SELECT template_name, subject_line, content FROM email_templates WHERE template_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3
SELECT customer_name, email_address, preferences->>'theme' AS theme FROM customers WHERE preferences->>'theme' = 'dark'
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM email_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE preference_1='sports';
SELECT template_name, template_content FROM email_templates ORDER BY template_name DESC;

SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers JOIN customer_preferences ON customers.customer_id = customer_preferences.customer_id JOIN preferences ON customer_preferences.preference_id = preferences.preference_id;

SELECT customer_name, template_content FROM customers JOIN dynamic_email_content ON customers.customer_id = dynamic_email_content.customer_id JOIN email_templates ON dynamic_email_content.template_id = email_templates.template_id;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, template_name, dynamic_content FROM customers c JOIN dynamic_email_content d ON c.customer_id = d.customer_id JOIN email_templates e ON e.template_id = d.template_id
SELECT customer_name, preference_name FROM customers c INNER JOIN customer_preferences p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id INNER JOIN preferences pref ON p.preference_id = pref.preference_id
SELECT customer_id, template_name, template_content FROM dynamic_email_content e JOIN email_templates t ON e.template_id = t.template_id ORDER BY customer_id ASC
